sentence.text: Our findings provide exploratory evidence for hypermethylation of the key tumour suppressor gene cellular response to DNA damage stimulus being implicated in smoking-associated colorectal carcinogenesis.

entity.text: cellular response to DNA damage stimulus

sentence.text: Our analyses identified 15 CpG sites within the cellular response to DNA damage stimulus 1A promoter that were significantly hypermethylated and 14 CpG loci within the NFATC1 gene body that were significantly hypomethylated (pLIS < 1 × 10<sup>-5</sup> ) in the tumours of active smokers.

entity.text: cellular response to DNA damage stimulus
